title: Minchat Chinukh
enDesc: Written by Yosef Babad (1800–1874), Minchat Chinukh is a commentary on Sefer HaChinukh. Minchat Chinukh discusses the halakhic aspects of the mitzvot through the lens of the Talmud and the Rishonim.
